title: Taskforce Group focused on ways to help Covance (Northumberland County Council)
text: ( Source : Northumberland County Council ) 14 Oct 2015 A regional task force has been formed to look at options for the Northumberland site of Covance, a drug development services company facing potential closure. The Taskforce Group held its
